title: Our Services
subtitle: Tailored solutions to transform your data into competitive advantage

service1.title: UX redesign of your existing reports
service1.description: Optimize the user experience of your existing Power BI reports to maximize their adoption and impact. We analyze your current reports, identify friction points and propose a complete user-centered redesign.
deliverables: Complete UX audit of your existing reports
Style guide and Power BI design system
Redesigned and optimized Power BI reports
Team training on the new interface

service2.title: Complete dashboard creation
service2.description: Custom design and development of Power BI dashboards, from data strategy to production deployment. A comprehensive approach that integrates your business needs and technical constraints.
deliverables: Testing and validation with end users
benefits: Measurable ROI from the first weeks

service3.title: UX coaching for internal teams
service3.description: Train and support your internal teams so they can create engaging and user-centered Power BI reports. A complete skills transfer for your autonomy.
deliverables: UX training applied to Power BI (2 days)
Creation of an internal design system
benefits: Visual consistency across all your reports

cta.title: Ready to transform your Power BI reports?
cta.subtitle: Let's discuss your project and find the solution that best fits your needs.
